page.title: 16MOUNTAIN'S FARM, QUARRINGTON
page.content: The 3000 acres of{Mountain's land have been{farmed}for 60 years. Mr Mountain has 1000{ewes}and about 1600{lambs}each year. He has 1600 acres of{sugar beet,}400 acres of {grass,}65 acres of{onions}(on land near Boston), 20{tractors,}3{combine {harvesters,}and 3{potato pickers. He employs 3 mechanics and l boy. He has a{computer}for accounts and wages. It takes l hour to work out the wages bill. There is a{Company Accountant and a{secretary}who work in the office. Mr Mountain employs 32 people on the farm. He has 9{lorries.}He can contact employees 30 miles away by{radio.}He is always busy. The farm uses{compound {fertilizer.}Acid is sprayed on the {potatoes}to kill pests. The lorries are always in use. Mr Mountain is an {intensive farmer.
